709793f-b.title: Manhattan: 7th Avenue - 42nd Street (West)
709793f-b.text:
(1)
Seventh Ave., west side, north from West 42nd, to and including West
43rd Streets, showing the Rialto Theatre occupying the N.W. corner.
February 22, 1933.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same, at a later date, and showing a more limited view. The
Rialto Theatre is seen being demolished. Also shown (left) are Nos.
201-205 (Rialto Theatre), and 207-211 (Republic Thectre) West 42nd
Street, at and adjoining the N.W. corner of Seventh Ave.
May 27, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
